Verses: 1 appozhudhu Naagamaaththiyanaagiya Soppaar Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 eraalamaana Vaarththaigalukku Uththaravu Sollavendaamo? Vaaichchaalagan Needhimaanaai Vilanguvaano?
3 ummudaiya Veembuvaarththaigalukku Manushar Mavunamaayiruppaargalo? Neer Pariyaasampannumpodhu, Oruvarum Ummai Vetkappaduththavendaamo?
4 en Sol Suththam Endrum, Naan Dhevareerudaiya Paarvaikkuth Thuppuravaanavan Endrum Neer Sollugireer.
5 aanaalum Dhevan Pesi, Umakku Virodhamaaith Thammudaiya Udhadugalaith Thirandhu,

6 umakku Gnaanaththin Ragasiyangalai Velippaduththinaal Nalamaayirukkum; Ullapadi Paarththaal, Adhu Rattippulladhaayirukkiradhu; Aagaiyaal Ummudaiya Akkiramaththirketrapadi Dhevan Ummai Dhandikkavillaiyendru Arindhukollum.
7 dhevanudaiya Andharanga Gnaanaththai Neer Aaraaindhu, Sarvavallavarudaiya Sampooranaththai Neer Ariyakkoodumo?
8 adhu Vaanapariyandham Uyarndhadhu; Ummaal Enna Aagum? Adhu Paadhaalaththilum Aazhamaanadhu, Neer Ariyakkoodiyadhu Enna?
9 adhin Alavu Boomiyaippaarkkilum Neelamum, Samuththiraththaippaarkkilum Agalamumaayirukkiradhu.
10 avar Pidiththaalum, Avar Adaiththaalum, Avar Nyaayaththil Konduvandhu Niruththinaalum, Avaraith Thadaipannugiravan Yaar?
11 manusharudaiya Maayaththai Avar Arivaar; Akkiramaththai Avar Kandum, Adhai Gavaniyaadhiruppaaro?
12 buththiyillaadha Manushan Kaattukkazhudhaikkuttikku Oppaagap Pirandhirundhaalum, Perunenjullavanaayirukkiraan.
13 neer Ummudaiya Irudhayaththai Aayaththappaduththi, Ummudaiya Kaigalai Avarukku Neraaga Viriththaal Nalamaayirukkum.
14 ummudaiya Kaiyile Akkiramam Irundhaal, Adhai Dhooraththil Agatrivittu, Aniyaayam Ummudaiya Koodaarangalil Vaasamaayirukkavottaadhirum.
15 appozhudhu Ummudaiya Mugaththai Maasillaamal Ereduththu, Bayappadaamal Thidankondiruppeer.
16 appozhudhu Neer Varuththaththai Marandhu, Kadandhupona Thanneeraippola Adhai Ninaippeer.
17 appozhudhu Ummudaiya Aayusukaalam Pattappagalaippaarkkilum Pragaasamaayirukkum; Irul Adaindha Neer Vidiyarkaalaththaippoliruppeer.
18 nambikkai Undaayirukkiradhinaal Thidanaayiruppeer; Thondi Aaraaindhu Sugamaaip Paduththukkolveer.
19 bayappaduththuvaarillaamal Niththirai Seyveer; Anegar Umadhu Mugaththai Nokki Vinnappampannuvaargal.
20 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Kangal Pooththuppoi, Avargal Adaikkalam Avargalai Vittozhindhu, Avargal Nambikkai Saagiravan Suvaasampol Ozhindhupogum Endraan.
